dialogue.introduction: Of the two Fusou-class super-dreadnought battleships, I am the elder sister, Fusou. Please take care of me and my younger sister Yamashiro.
dialogue.library_intro: The first of the Japanese designs for the super-dreadnought battleship class, Fusou. Please remember to take care of my younger sister, Yamashiro, as well. Leyte Gulf? Oh well, I would like to go there someday. Right?
dialogue.secretary1: Admiral? If you touch it too much - I'm a little worried about the ammunition storage...
dialogue.secretary2: Admiral, the weather is good today...
dialogue.secretary3: *sigh* Although the sky is so blue...
dialogue.secretaryidle: Um... Admiral? I wonder if I wasn't heard... Admiral? Admiraal? ...Oh my, that's a relief. Fusou, waiting here on stand by.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiralâ€¦ If you work too hard, your body will get bad. Oh, me?...I...*sigh*
dialogue.wedding: My main cannons, aren't they wonderful? But specialising in firepower too much can lead to all kinds of problems...If it's Admiral, I'm sure you understand, right?
dialogue.show_players_score: There's a notification for the Admiral.
dialogue.equipment2: Please modernize my sister Yamashiro as well.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: It's only a scratch, don't worry about it.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: With these large turrets, my shoulders get stiff... I'll be resting for a while.
dialogue.docking_complete: The boat has return to the frontline.
dialogue.ship_construction: It looks like we got a new comrade...
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Admiral, the fleet has returned to base.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Battleship Fusou, setting sail. Yamashiro? Don't fall behind, we're sortieing!
dialogue.air_battle: I just don't wanna lose out to Ise and Hyuuga...
dialogue.attack: Yamashiro, are you okay? It's the firefight.
dialogue.night_battle: I'll show you the real power of the Nishimura fleet!
dialogue.night_attack: I just don't wanna lose out to Ise and Hyuuga...
dialogue.artillery_spotting: I just don't wanna lose out to Ise and Hyuuga...
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: I just don't wanna lose out to Ise and Hyuuga...
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: I just don't wanna lose out to Ise and Hyuuga...
dialogue.mvp: At least I can take pride in my firepower. ...Eh? Armor and speed? Those...are things I want...but...
dialogue.moderately_damaged: In this kind of condition, I won't be able to breach the Leyte Gulf...
dialogue.sunk: Am I going to sink after all? Hope Yamashiro's still fine...
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Yamashiro, it's second anniversary. We just witnessed our second anniversary. Now let's meet our Admiral.
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Yamashiro, there is indeed a lot of rain in the rainy season. I wonder if Shigure is doing well...
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Yamashiro? Summer is approaching. Do you want to go somewhere for a Fusou-class sibling trip? I wonder where would be nice.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Yamashiro, today is hot too. It's summer. With these clothes and rigging, we'll end sweating a little.
dialogue.fall_2015: This year's autumn/fall has also arrived hasn't it. Yamashiro, are you prepared? This year we'll break through.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Yamashiro, this dish is delicious. You should have some too. Right? It's very different from normal chicken.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Yamashiro, it's the end of the year, the season for cleaning. We have to clean our main guns thoroughly and face the new year.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year! Please be kind to Fusou-class this year too.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Yamashiro, it's Setsubun ... You eat a number of these beans based on how old you are ... Then, you throw the rest at those who play the Demon ...
